title: [Bad] Tinder controls virtual items that you paid for.

tosdr.case: [Bad] Tinder controls virtual items that you paid for.-bad-undefined
tosdr.tldr:
Tinder controls and can eliminate at any time, with or without notice virtual items that you paid for.
... You agree to pay all fees and applicable taxes incurred by you or anyone using your Tinder account...
... YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT TINDER IS NOT REQUIRED TO PROVIDE A REFUND FOR ANY REASON.
